scripts.preinstall: curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.1/install.sh | bash; . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh; nvm install 5; nvm use 5
scripts.docs:git_master: git add . && git commit -am 'gitbook updates'&& git push origin master
scripts.wip:git_gh_pages: cd _book; rm ./.gitignore; git commit --allow-empty -m 'ghpages: Update docs and examples' && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs and examples' && git checkout -b gh-pages; git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages; git fetch; git rebase gh-pages;  git push git@github.com:joshmccall221/gitbook.git gh-pages --force
